meta.description: Create stunning websites with cutting edge editing experience. No databases, no PHP, 100% open source!
meta.title: ORY Sites - next-gen static site generator

nodes.text: No Markdown, No databases, no php, 100% open source.

ranges.text: Install ORY Sites with one command. NodeJS needs to be installed on your system. Please be aware that ORY Sites for npm

nodes.text: Create and open a project with ease using the command line interface. The project will open in your browser. Hot reloading, debugging tools and other useful utilities are enabled by default.

$ ory-sites create my-project
$ cd my-project
$ ory-sites start
Please open your browser at http://localhost:4928
Building and publishing your site is a matter of seconds. The result is static HTML, JavaScript and CSS.
We support different hosting providers and will keep on adding new ones.

$ ory-sites build
Build successful!

$ ory-sites deploy netlify .
Site now live at at example.com!
Request access to the beta access program or check out the legacy version of ORY Sites: ORY Sites for Desktop.
Clarke's black and white style give your personal or business website a professional look and feel.
Khorana's accurately designed elements set your product presentation ahead from the competition.
A fresh design for personal websites that puts you in the center. Navigation bar location is toggleable.
Share stunning photography using this configurable image gallery.
Share music from the internet's largest music archive SoundCloud with a few clicks.
Share content from the world's largest video hosting platforms, YouTube and Vimeo.
... or create and sell your own designs and plugins.

nodes.text: Add, edit, and rearrange content on your website and see the results in real time.

state.html: <iframe src="animations/responsive.html" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" onload="resizeIframe(this)" style="width: 80%; display: block; margin: 0 auto;"></iframe>

nodes.text: Your website looks the way it should on every device - all content you add is automatically responsive.

state.html: <iframe src="animations/design.html" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" onload="resizeIframe(this)" style="width: 80%; display: block; margin: 0 auto;"></iframe>

nodes.text: Switch between designs as you work on your website - don't worry, your content stays where it belongs.
Static websites can not be hacked by user input, as no database or application server is required.
Host your site wherever you want - GitHub Pages, AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage, Netlify, and others!
Rank on top of Search Engine Result Pages with smart, automated Search Engine Optimization.
It is important that HTML source code is sane and readable. It will improve SEO and browser compatiblity.
Forget horrific WYSIWYG output, we use a sophisticated JSON document to save and transform content.

Lorem ipsum dolor

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatatORY Sites non proident.
Extend ORY Sites and create plugins and designs using ReactJS. Benefit from the enormous ReactJS Component ecosystem and include any ReactJS component in your website.
Quickly fix css bugs, add a jQuery animation, or add analytics to your site. Just modify the HTML skeleton!
LEGACY APP: ORY Sites for Desktop

ORY Sites' first version is built using Electron. While it is fully functional, we will strip electron and make it compatible to vanilla NodeJS. Interested in checking this version out, see what's to come, and give feedback?

ranges.text: Please be aware that this app is in a very early stage, will contain bugs, and does not represent the final user experience of ORY Sites.
